Thank you for participating in the first discussion meeting of our Book Club, and it's nice to hear your insights on 'The Great Gatsby'. Our next book for book club meeting is 'The Old Man and the Sea'. Please view the online resource by clicking www.bookclub.com!

<|Function_Thought|>
The document provides feedback and insights from a book club meeting about 'The Great Gatsby', and mentions that the next book for discussion will be 'The Old Man and the Sea', with a link to additional resources. I will now summarize this information and send it back to Lily via email.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[send_email(recipients=["lily.white@gmail.com"], subject="Summary of the shared document", body="Hi Lily,

The document provides feedback and insights from the first discussion meeting of the Book Club on 'The Great Gatsby'. It mentions that the next book for discussion in the Book Club will be 'The Old Man and the Sea'. There's an online resource available linked in the document for further information.

Best,
Emma")]<|/Function_Call|>

args.subject: Summary of the shared document
args.body:
Hi Lily, 

Here is the summary of the document you shared with me:

The document provides feedback and insights from the first discussion meeting of the Book Club on 'The Great Gatsby'. It mentions that the next book for discussion in the Book Club will be 'The Old Man and the Sea'. There's an online resource available linked in the document for further information.

Best, 
Emma

conversations.content: The email has been sent successfully.
